title.rendered: Automated Human Avatar Synthesis for Obesity Control using Low-Cost Depth Cameras

content.rendered: In this paper a framework is presented for monitoring shape changes on the human body with applications to obesity control. This framework uses a lowcost infrared depth camera in order to capture the 3D shape of the human body and approximate it as a set of spherical functions.

excerpt.rendered: In this paper a framework is presented for monitoring shape changes on the human body with applications to obesity control. This framework uses a lowcost infrared depth camera in order to capture the 3D shape of the human body and approximate it as a set of spherical functions.
